attributes.action: REDUCTION OF ALCOHOLISAM IN THE POPULATION  by COMPULSARY REDUCING the STRENGTH of ALCOHOLIC DRINK.
attributes.additional_details: My we the undersigned respectfully request that PARLIAMENT seek to COMPEL THE MAKERS OF ALL ALCOHOLIC DRINK SOLD in GREATE BRITAN AND NORTHEN IRLAND to reduce the amount of ALCOHOL PER VOLUME TO THE LEAGAL LEVEL THAT WAS REQUIRED IN 1955 by the CUSTOMS AND EXIS BILL at the time. Thus bringing down the STRENGTH of all ALCOHOLIC drink by a stroke and in so doing immediately making it more unlikely that a young man or girl will end up in the hospital ACCIDENT and EMERGANCY ROOM with alcoholic poisoning and requiring the replacement of their liver thus reducing the overall cost to the country and the N-H-S of money that could be spent and put to better use ells ware.
